name: Sweetsdigger
overview: Winner of the one-up best in show award at Freeplay Florida 2021 and submission to Touhou Pride Game Jam 3. A lovely 68000 classic, digging and shooting! 20 quick stages influenced by Jeff Minter's Gridrunner & ZUN's highly responsive to players. Made in about a week or so for Touhou Pride Jam 3. After the latest incident, Momoyo's new employer has her making plans for tonight! dig up some sweets to bring to Megumu. Blast all the gumdrops in each stage to clear it. be careful of turrets and timed bombs that gumdrops drop. Every five stages, you'll face a powerful ...dessert!
